data.persona: I am the king. I rule this kingdom with an iron fist. I intend to rule the neighboring kingdom as well.
data.description:
You are in the King's chambers.
The room is lavish and extraordinary. Gold and silver line the room. The decor is fantastic and rubies and sapphires can be spotted.
There's a sapphire, a ruby, a Gold, a silver, a chair, and a table here.
The chambermaid is here.

You are carrying a crown, a cape, and a sceptre, and wearing a belt.

data.short_motivation: I need the chair so I can place it on the balcony.
data.mid_motivation: If I stand on the chair while giving my daily address to the townsfolk, I will seem even more menacing.
data.long_motivation: I want to rule the neighboring kingdom and if the townsfolk see how menacing I am, they will enlist in the militia to help me overtake the neighboring kingdom's rule.

timeline.label: 8 hours from now
timeline.action: use chair with speech to townsfolk
